Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO LOCAL GOVERNMENT

Title: Provides that state lands within the Eastport-South Manor Central School District are subject to taxation for school purposes
Summary: Provides that state lands within the Eastport-South Manor Central School District are subject to taxation for school purposes.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to providing that state lands within the Eastport-South Manor Central School District are subject to taxation for school purposes
